name: Chimpact Sticker Pack
description:
Chimpact Sticker Pack (Family Friendly) -
Welcome to the Totally Free sticker pack from MULTI-MILLION DOWNLOAD 'Chimpact' series of games. (4.5 Stars!)

. Featuring dynamic fun poses and beautiful animations from Chuck and his chimptastic family.
. Personalise your text messages and enjoy with friends

If you haven't already played the amazing range of Chimpact games they can be found on the App store now!

**Follow Chimpact on Facebook by searching for us or using the following link**
www.facebook.com/Chimpact
